summary.para: The DitherType enumeration identifies the available algorithms for dithering when a bitmap is converted.

Calling the method of a Bitmap object changes the pixel format of that Bitmap. If the conversion results in a reduced bit depth (fewer bits per pixel), then certain colors in the original bitmap will be simulated by a dither (checkerboard) pattern made up of colors that are available in the new pixel format. The members of the DitherType enumeration identify the algorithms available for performing this dithering.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeNone
member.summary: No dithering is performed. Pixels in the source bitmap are mapped to the nearest color in the palette specified by the palette parameter of the method. This algorithm can be used with any palette. If the palette specified by the palette parameter does not have one of the standard fixed formats listed in the enumeration, pass PaletteTypeCustom to the palettetype parameter.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeSolid
member.summary: No dithering is performed. Pixels in the source bitmap are mapped to the nearest color in the palette specified by the palette parameter of the method. This algorithm can be used with any palette. If the palette specified by the palette parameter does not have one of the standard fixed formats listed in the enumeration, pass PaletteTypeCustom to the palettetype parameter.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeOrdered4x4
member.summary: You can use this algorithm to perform dithering based on the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes. You can also use this algorithm to convert a bitmap to a 16-bits-per-pixel format that has no palette.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeOrdered8x8
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeOrdered16x16
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeSpiral4x4
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeSpiral8x8
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeDualSpiral4x4
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeDualSpiral8x8
member.summary: Dithering is performed using the colors in one of the standard fixed palettes.

member.name: DitherType.DitherTypeErrorDiffusion
member.summary: Dithering is performed based on the palette specified by the palette parameter of the method. This algorithm can be used with any palette. If the palette specified by the palette parameter does not have one of the standard fixed formats listed in the enumeration, pass PaletteTypeCustom to the palettetype parameter.
